name: 10000 Cubes
description:
This is a test for your graphic card, check how your GPU can handle 10 000 Cubes that all move independently as a rigid body. You can see the FPS, your video card and CPU brand and share it. I'm curious to know how fast different GPU can deal with 10 000 moving cubes.

This test was made with Unreal Engine 4.26. I try it with Unreal Engine 5 but the FPS is so low that is not very interesting...

Note: Press "C" key to a little dance that pushes away cubes for fun.
